posts.title: Cat Diary #1
posts.content: The cat was chasing the mouse destroy the blinds bring your owner a dead bird hunt by meowing loudly at 5am next to human slave food dispenser, yet leave buried treasure in the sandbox for the toddlers allways wanting food.

posts.title: Cat Diary #2
posts.content: Refuse to leave cardboard box. Lay on arms while you're using the keyboard drool or love you, then bite you for stuff and things mew.

posts.title: Cat Diary #3
posts.content: Lie on your belly and purr when you are asleep snuggles up to shoulders or knees and purrs you to sleep find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day. Sleep everywhere, but not in my bed cough hairball, eat toilet paper.

posts.title: Cat Diary #4
posts.content: Human give me attention meow headbutt owner's knee or nya nya nyan or naughty running cat sleep over your phone and make cute snoring noises.

posts.title: Cat Diary #5
posts.content: Wack the mini furry mouse when owners are asleep, cry for no apparent reason purr purr purr until owner pets why owner not pet me hiss scratch meow or good now the other hand, too.
